noun.description: Playing cards, traditionally a pack of 78 with five suits, used for fortune-telling and (especially in Europe) in certain games. The suits are typically swords, cups, coins (or pentacles), batons (or wands), and a permanent suit of trump.
examples: tarot is a powerful way of revealing the truth about your life

origin: Late 16th century: from French, from Italian tarocchi, of unknown origin.
